entry.title: How to Rip Sprites From Jetpack Joyride

link.title: How to Rip Sprites From Jetpack Joyride

entry.summary: Introduction Recently, I was interested in ripping sprites from Halfbrick Studios’ popular game Jetpack Joyride. I downloaded the APK file and extracted it, but instead of finding a viewable image such as a PNG, I only found texture files with the extension .tex. At first I thought it might be an obscure image file, but could still be opened, however, it turned out that it was a custom format o...
